Build Identifier: 

2 clicks are required to close the doorhanger with opened button menu (with options like "Not now" etc)


Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open some page with login form - for example https://www.google.com/accounts/ServiceLoginAuth
2. Enter fake login data and press "Login"
3. When password doorhanger appear open the button menu
4. Click mouse somewhere on the page
Actual Results:  
Button menu closes, but doorhanger is still open

Expected Results:  
Doorhanger should close

Moreover, if the first click is on some text on the page, second click (if fast enough) selects the text and third click closes the doorhanger
